<properties pageTitle="4d50265f-d918-4ddf-89ab-6777d3809419" description="3143747f-1059-459e-bd71-f2ba4886f09a" services="storage" documentationCenter="" authors="patshea123" manager="douge" editor="tglee"/>

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: // Create the queueclient. CloudQueueClient queueClient = storageAccount.CreateCloudQueueClient();
// Get a reference to a queue named "messageQueue" CloudQueue messageQueue = queueClient.GetQueueReference("messageQueue");

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: // Create the CloudQuecClient if it does not exist messageQueue.CreateIfNotExists();
